stepDefinitionsList.name: Click an element on a page

expectedFieldsList.description: The iframe's DOM query selector, or "main" for the main frame

stepDefinitionsList.name: Scroll to a percentage depth of a web page
Submit a form by clicking a button
Check a page's Lighthouse performance score
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<throttleTo>mobile|desktop) lighthouse performance score should be (?<expectedScore>\d{1,3}) or higher/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check current page info
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<field>status|text|url) of the current page should (?<operator>contain|not contain|be) (?<expectation>.+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (contain, not contain, or be)

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check current page meta tag
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the (?<metaName>.+) meta tag on the current page should (?<operator>be|contain|not contain|not be longer than|exist) ?(?<expectation>.+)?/

expectedFieldsList.description: Check Logic (be, contain, not contain, not be longer than, exist)

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check for a specific network request
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /there should be (?<reqCount>\d+) matching network requests? for (?<baseUrl>.+)/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that a Google Floodlight tag fired
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /a floodlight tag should have fired for advertiser (?<aid>\d+), group (?<group>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+), and activity (?<atag>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Custom Variables, an optional map of variable names and their expected values

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Google Analytics tracked a pageview
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /google analytics should have tracked a pageview for tracking id (?<id>[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Tracking / Measurement ID associated with the GA instance/property (e.g. UA-75228722-5)
Parameter Checks, an optional map of Google Analytics Measurement Protocol Parameters and their expected values.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Google Analytics tracked an event
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /google analytics should have tracked an event with category (?<ec>.+) and action (?<ea>.+) for tracking id (?<id>[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)/

expectedFieldsList.description: Tracking / Measurement ID associated with the GA instance/property (e.g. UA-75228722-5)
Parameter Checks, an optional map of Google Analytics Measurement Protocol Parameters and their expected values.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Marketo Munchkin tracking loads
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the tracking code for munchkin account id (?<id>[a-zA-Z0-9-]+) should load/

expectedFieldsList.description: Munchkin Account ID associated with the user's Marketo instance (e.g. 460-tdh-945)

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that Pardot tracking loads
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the tracking code for pardot account (?<aid>\d+) and campaign (?<cid>\d+) should have loaded/

expectedFieldsList.description: Parameter Checks, an optional map of query parameters and their expected values.

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that the LinkedIn Conversion Pixel fired
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the linkedin conversion pixel for partner id (?<pid>\d+) should have fired/

stepDefinitionsList.name: Check that the LinkedIn Insight tag fired
stepDefinitionsList.expression: /the linkedin insight tag for partner id (?<pid>\d+) should have fired/

extras.label: A Browser
extras.lpDescription: Your website is the front door to your sales and marketing process. Don't just test your website in isolation: validate that you're capturing the right data in the right systems.
extras.name: automatoninc/web

useCases.title: Lead Generation Form QA
useCases.description: Fill out a form, then check Marketing Automation for the lead.
useCases.steps:
- step: Given I navigate to https://example.com
- step: When I enter {{test}} into input[name=Email]
- step: And I submit the form by clicking button[value=Subscribe]
- step: Then the source field on Marketo Lead {{test}} should be Web

useCases.title: Marketing Tag and Pixel QA
useCases.description: Perform a key action, then check that a tag fired.
useCases.steps:
- step: Given I navigate to https://example.com
- step: When I click the page element a.primary-cta
- step: Then Google Analytics should have tracked an event with category Link and action Click for tracking ID UA-1234-5
